Translations.Text: Di Kamoe meuhat janji ka sudah Janji ngon Nabi dum ka meuikat Ngon gata meuhat pih hana ubah Meunan pih ngon Noh Musa Ibrahim Aneuk Mariyam Isa meutuah Bandum ureueng nyan janji meuikat Keubit roe that brat hana ban peugah
Bandum Neutanyong bak ureueng beuna Keubit sibeuna taba risalah Teuma keu kaphe ka Neuseudia Azeub that raya peudeh sileupah

Hai ureueng mukmin beuna taingat Keu gata nikmat Neubri le Allah Yoh teuka musoh jijak prang gata Kamoe peuteuka angen kreuh leupah Meukirem teuntra nyang han deuh taeu Tuhan cit Neueu hana meuilah Peue nyang tapubuet Tuhan Neukalon
Gata jiginton le musoh Allah Di ateuh diyup jikeupong gata j Sang seupot mata teuh dum geulisah j Ate sang jiek ka troh bak takue Hana meupeue-peue ka roh tapeugah Hana got sangka teuh le keu Tuhan
Nyan keuh cubaan Neubri le Allah 3 Ujian keu dum ureueng meuiman Keubit meuguncang hebat that leupah
Awak munaphek cit jikheun teuntee Janji Neutipee tanyoe le Allah Meunan pih Rasul tanyoe geutaki Lheuh geumeujanji jinoe ka ubah Soe nyang lam ate jih na peunyaket Meunan cit narit jih saban leupah

Saboh golongan nibak awaknyan Jikheun bak ureueng nyang di Madinah Hai awak Yasrib di sinoe hana Ã­ Teumpat keu gata hana geukeubah Tajakwoe keudeh bek le disinan Saboh golongan jikheun le bagah Jilakee izin jijak bak Nabi Kamoe keumbali ya Rasulullah Hana soe tinggai rumoh kamoe soh Atra hana soh meuka jipeugah Napsu jimeung plueng bek roh lam kawan
Meunyoe jiseurang sit yo jih leupah $ Meunyoe jikeupong ban siseun lingka Teuma jimaba lawan peurintah Meuhat jih jijak ho nyang jimaba Meu bacut hana jiiem jibantah
Padahai dilee ka jimeujanji Han jipeurugoe janji ngon Allah Ka jimeujanji han roe jisurot Jiplueng u likot rakan jikeubah Janji ngon Tuhan dudoe Neutanyong Jaweub beukeunong mangat bek salah
